requirements.title: Campaign management - Create, organize, and manage marketing campaigns
requirements.description: Users can create new campaigns with metadata (name, description, goals), organize them in a list view, and manage campaign lifecycle.

requirements.title: Document upload and processing - Support multiple file formats
requirements.description: Users can upload brand guidelines, product docs, and context materials in PDF, DOCX, TXT, and XLSX formats for use in content generation.

requirements.title: AI content generation - Generate marketing content across multiple types
requirements.description: Users can generate marketing content for blog posts, social media, emails, and advertisements using AI integration with Ollama or external services.

requirements.title: Content type selection - Support distinct content types with appropriate parameters
requirements.description: System provides distinct content type options (blog, social, email, ads) with appropriate generation parameters and output formatting for each type.

requirements.title: Document context integration - Use uploaded documents in generation
requirements.description: AI content generation incorporates uploaded documents as context to produce brand-aligned, contextually relevant content.

requirements.title: Generated content review - Display, edit, and refine AI output
requirements.description: Users can view AI-generated content, make edits, and refine results before saving to ensure quality and brand alignment.

requirements.title: Content persistence - Save and retrieve generated content
requirements.description: System persists generated content associated with campaigns and allows retrieval for future reference and editing.

requirements.title: Responsive UI - Functional interface across viewports
requirements.description: UI provides functional, accessible interface across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports with appropriate layouts and interactions.

requirements.title: Content calendar - Schedule and visualize content timeline
requirements.description: Users can view scheduled content across campaigns in a monthly calendar view with drag-and-drop scheduling support.

requirements.title: Template gallery - Browse and apply pre-built templates
requirements.description: Users can browse pre-built content templates by category and content type, and apply them to generate content faster.

requirements.title: Document search - Search uploaded documents
requirements.description: Users can search uploaded documents by name, content keywords, and campaign association to quickly find relevant context materials.

requirements.title: Campaign filtering - Filter content by campaign
requirements.description: Users can filter documents and generated content by campaign context to focus on specific marketing initiatives.

requirements.title: Usage analytics dashboard - Track generation metrics
requirements.description: Dashboard displays content generation volume, estimated time saved, and campaign activity metrics to measure productivity.

requirements.title: Image inclusion toggle - Optional image generation
requirements.description: Users can optionally request image generation or image recommendations alongside text content generation.

requirements.title: Content regeneration - Generate variations with adjusted prompts
requirements.description: Users can regenerate content variations by adjusting generation prompts and parameters to explore different creative directions.

requirements.title: Batch document upload - Process multiple files simultaneously
requirements.description: Users can upload multiple document files in a single operation for efficient bulk context material processing.
